metadata.title: A Trash Game Realignment of Elevated Tastes

tracks.text: Muscular legs walk forward. Twin green blades dangle to side. The thighs bear large, dark scars.
Muscular arms and abs also bear scars.
Sunraku wears only blue shorts and a blue bird mask.
Red text appears, Shangri-La Frontier. Beyond the text is an expanse of mountains, forests, plains, and cities. We zoom out and the expanse is reflected in VR goggles worn by Rakuro
At night, Sunraku stands in a misty field
Moon light shines over Sunraku as he stands near large rocks.
Rakuro smiles. His image glitches into Sunraku, whose brow furrows
A woman with long purple hair twirls a spear in a forest.
A girl with blond pig tails walks forward. Looking away from us, she puts her hands on her hips.
A large knight wears a helmet. Emul wears a suit and top hat. She leaps and is replaced by a girl in a suit and top hat.
Vysache wears an eye patch. He holds a carrot shaped smoking pipe and sits cross legged in a low lit, traditional Japanese room
A man wearing armor and a purple cape sits on a box in a storage room.
Lycagon bears fangs over a forest, backdropped by a red moon. Yellow lines shine around her red, glowing eyes.
Sunraku runs through the woods. He leaps, and crosses in front of a full moon.
Flying through the air, he kicks and punches goblins. Holding red twin knives, he cuts at more goblins.
With red glowing fists, the blond girl fires energy blasts at goblins. The purple haired woman strikes human sized wasps. They fight back to back.
Vysache, with a scar over his right eye, slowly opens his eyes.
The purple haired girl strikes with a sword. The blond girl punches with a fire ball.
The knight strikes the ground, and the ground explodes with brilliant light that fades to lightning.
Rabituza, a town of small red houses and rabbit shaped motifs. The Palace rests at the top of a giant tree.
Rabituza fades into the bird man's red eye
Emul leaps up, smiling.
In a forest glowing with a red mist, the blond girl, Sunraku, and purple haired girl walk side by side.
Text, 4, A Trash Game Realignment of Elevated Tastes
A cicada rubs its wings together.
The Game Shop
We look around shelves at patrons looking at games.
Mana gives Rei a thumbs up
Rei turns bright red
Label, Rumi Hizutome
Rakuro grabs a can of Energy Kaiser from the fridge.
Flashback, Sunraku with marsh daggers, landing crits on Lycagon
Vysache's attendants hide behind him and look at Sunraku
He exhales smoke
He bows in a yakuza style.
His one eye glows red
Vysache takes a step
He approaches, backlit, towering over Sunraku
He reaches out a hand
Vash slaps Sunraku's shoulder
Vash tosses a collar over his shoulder, which expands and wraps itself around Sunraku's throat.
Half experience, 2.5x stat points
Rakuro's bedroom
He downs a drink
He puts on a VR goggles and jumps back into bed
BERP character Sunraku wears all black. He stares at Modor Katzo, a blond man in a yellow coat.
Button, Match Application
Sunraku presses the button. Green text, Consent.
Katzo's arms and legs glitch and move like tentacles. He adds extra limbs. Sunraku's arms glitch and multiply, punching at Katzo's tentacle limbs.
Nearby players watch them from a distance
One of Katzo's hands disconnects, flies around, and punches Sunraku in the stomach
Sunraku lands on the ground.
Katzo stares and Sunraku
A woman with thigh length purple hair spins a spear over her head. A message dialog pops up.
She strikes soldiers, leaving a mist of red as they fall
Arthur Pencilgon, Player Killer, Level 99, HP 400
Label, Secondale, back alley
An ornate, white door appears in glowing sparkles on an alleyway dead end.
Emul follows Sunraku out of the alley
Dialog
Dialog, NPC "Magical Bunny Emul" has joined your party.
Emul, Sorceror, Level 56. MP 655.
Emul crawls on Sunraku's shoulder.
Girls notice Emul
A girl takes a picture of Sunraku running.
Sunraku and Emul run towards craggy outcroppings.
They turn. A large goat with a purple head runs towards them.
It focuses on Lycagon's Mark, revealing a crackling purple aura.
The goat breaks, turns around, and runs away.
He runs after it.
They run
A blob rises in the mud
Emul jumps on Sunraku's shoulder. He takes a step back, and looks up as the blob towers above him.
A giant shark with legs glares down at Sunraku. Label, Area Boss, Mud Digger.
Rakuro floats, as if in water. Debris floats around him.
He reaches out a hand. The debris glitters.
He opens his blue eyes. He has short, spiky blue hair.
Pixels float in cyberspace. We follow a tunnel of light
Grass blows before an orange sunset.
Sunraku, bearing Lycagon's Mark, stands.
Rei opens her brown eyes. She has short brown hair that wraps around her face.
Sunraku walks on a path with Emul, a white bunny wearing a blue coat, red vest, and top hat. Emul twirls and back flips.
Surrounded by stone columns, the knight appears. Her armor is white and lined in gold. Her helmet bears a long, red plume.
Arthur Pencilgon, a woman with long purple hair, looks determined. Her hair moves gently in the wind.
A blond woman looks up. She has shoulder length hair tied up in pig tails.
Sunraku stares up as clouds roll over a blue sky. It glows yellow with a sunset, then darkens to a dark purple moon.
His bird mask feathers blows in the wind.
Pencilgon stands on a cliff in front of the moon, her hands on her hips.
The blond woman crouches on an outcropping, in front of the moon
Sunraku and the knight stand, facing opposite directions, surrounded by floating debris, backdropped by a nebula that glows prismatically from red to green to blue.
Blue pixels float in cyberspace as we fly through a tunnel of light
Elementary students sit in front of a stage. Sunraku pushes the word SLF Mini
An inn
Text, Logged Out
A zipper appears on the back of Emul's coat and opens. Purple, viscous smoke oozes out of her body
It gathers above her, and opens its round, white eyes
Smoke Emul opens a wide, toothy mouth
Rakuro sits up in bed.
Text, In fact, when players are logged out, their avatars disappear.
Credits roll.
